response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to revolutionize the way you experience [insert unique selling proposition here]. This extraordinary item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unparalleled quality and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1,000,000. To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional products. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional acquisition.", "product_price": 950000}
